question_text:
Question 33 
 
Consider the operator precedence and associativity rules for the integer the integer arithmetic operators 
 
given in the table below.
Operator  
Precedence  
Associativity
+ 
Highest  
Left
- 
High 
Right
* 
Medium 
Right
/ 
Low  
Right
The value of the expression 
3 1 5*2/ 7
2
4
7
6/ 2



 as per the above rules is ____________.
[Data Structure – Stack & Queue] 
Ans.  6 to 6
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
First, we will solve (+) with left associativity.

  
((3 1) 5) 2/ (7 2) 4 7 6/ 2






  
9 2/ 9
4
7
6/ 2


Now, we will solve 
( )

 with right associativity.

  
9 2/ (9 (4 (7 6)))/ 2





  
(9 2) / 6/ 2


  
(18/ (6/ 2))
      ←           
Right associative

  
(18/ 3)
6

Hence, the correct answer is 6.
